node.name: Remus Information Management
node.shortdescription:
Capture your thoughts

Remus is a set of plugins to enable information management in your IDE. It lets you capture your code-snippets, personal notes, website, screencasts, documents or any type of interesting information you see.

Enrich your source-code with information

With a linking functionality you can assign information units to any resources in your workspace, e.g. you can attach a Code-Snippet to a Java class or a PDF document to a XML file. Decide for your own if you want to share these linkings with others.

Share your thoughts

Remus provides a wide range of repositories to share your information with other developers, starting from an in-project through your CVS, SVN or Git Team provider until protocol-based repositories like WebDAV.

Remus is available in german and english Language.
node.body:

Remus is a set of plugins to enable information management in your IDE. It lets you capture your code-snippets, personal notes, website, screencasts, documents or any type of interesting information you see.

With a linking functionality you can assign information units to any resources in your workspace, e.g. you can attach a Code-Snippet to a Java class or a PDF document to a XML file. Decide for your own if you want to share these linkings with others.

Share your thoughts

Remus provides a wide range of repositories to share your information with other developers, starting from an in-project through your CVS, SVN or Git Team provider until protocol-based repositories like WebDAV.

Remus is available in german and english Language.
